summary: Comprehensive testing of Blood Bank Management System completed. Backend APIs show 100% success rate with all 17 endpoints working perfectly. Frontend authentication, dashboard, and core modules are fully functional. Complete blood donation workflow tested successfully from donor registration to inventory management.

ui_bugs.issue: Role selection dropdown has overlay interception issues making it difficult to select specific roles
ui_bugs.workaround: Default role selection works, users can register successfully

design_issues.issue: Chart rendering warnings about width/height dimensions
design_issues.note: Charts display correctly, only console warnings present

passed_tests: Donor registration with auto-generated ID and QR code
Blood unit creation with barcode generation
Lab testing with infectious disease screening
